title: New Science to Help Your Pet Live Healthier & Longer, with Renowned Veterinarian Dr. Karen Becker & Pet Health Leader Rodney Habib
description:
Dr. Karen Becker & Rodney Habib outline the ideal diet, nutrition, and exercise regimen for your pet to live the longest, best quality life! Plus, listener pet questions on medications/flea & tick chemicals, supplements, probiotics, acupuncture, allergies…and more!

Guest Links:

For more information on the book and social handles, go to: https://foreverdog.com/


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com

You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
